import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import Img from "../img/img.png" import Attach from "../img/attach.png" import { AuthContext } from '../context/AuthContext' import { ChatContext } from '../context/ChatContext' const Input = () => { const [text, setText] = useState("") const {currentUser} = useContext(AuthContext) const {data} = useContext(ChatContext) return (
) } export default Input
